schemes.name: PM-KISAN
schemes.description: Income support scheme providing direct financial assistance to farmers
schemes.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers owning cultivable land
schemes.benefits: ₹6000 per year in three equal installments of ₹2000 each

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.fullName: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
schemes.description: Employment guarantee scheme providing wage employment to rural households
schemes.eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work
schemes.benefits: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment per household per year

schemes.name: JAL JEEVAN
schemes.description: Providing functional household tap connections to every rural household
schemes.benefits: Functional household tap connection with assured water supply

schemes.name: PMAY
schemes.description: Housing for all scheme providing assistance for construction of pucca houses
schemes.eligibility: Houseless and households living in kutcha houses in rural areas
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance of ₹1.20 lakh in plain areas and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly areas

schemes.name: PMFBY
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers in case of crop failure
schemes.eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers
schemes.benefits: Insurance coverage for crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases

schemes.name: PMUY
schemes.description: Providing LPG connections to women from BPL households
schemes.eligibility: Women from BPL households, SC/ST, PMAY, AAY, and forest dwellers
schemes.benefits: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for first refill and stove

schemes.name: NSAP
schemes.description: Social security scheme providing pension to elderly, widows, and persons with disabilities
schemes.eligibility: BPL elderly (60+ years), widows, and persons with disabilities
schemes.benefits: Monthly pension ranging from ₹200 to ₹500 depending on category

schemes.name: PMGSY
schemes.description: Providing all-weather road connectivity to unconnected habitations
schemes.benefits: All-weather road connectivity to eligible unconnected habitations

schemes.name: PMKVY
schemes.description: Skill development scheme providing training to youth
schemes.benefits: Free skill training with certification and monetary rewards

schemes.name: SVAMITVA
schemes.fullName: Survey of Villages and Mapping with Improvised Technology in Village Areas
schemes.description: Providing property cards to rural households using drone technology
schemes.benefits: Property ownership cards for residential properties in rural areas
